'''"Maison Cardinalice's Lockbox"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Maison Cardinalice's Lockbox" is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Fontaine]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in the [[Administrative Area]] of the [[Fortress of Meropide]], on top of the [[Coupon Cafeteria]].
<gallery>
Item Maison Cardinalice's Lockbox Location.png|Map location
Item Maison Cardinalice's Lockbox Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>
